context.enderism.music_sheet_missing: You couldn't possibly play this music sheet with this instrument..
death.attack.retribution: %s got what was coming to them
advancement.enderism.charming.title: Charming
advancement.enderism.unfinished_symphony: Play a music sheet on any instrument
advancement.enderism.maestro.title: Maestro
advancement.enderism.maestro.desc: Play a music sheet on every Instrument
advancement.enderism.pirpell.title: Pirpell Hearts
advancement.enderism.pirpell.desc: Craft a Pirpell Ingot from Pirpell Fragments and Ancient Scraps
advancement.enderism.ancient_scrap.title: Outdated Material
advancement.enderism.ancient_scrap.desc: Find Ancient Scraps in an Ancient City
advancement.enderism.ancient_armor.title: Wearing History
advancement.enderism.ancient_armor.desc: Plate Netherite armor with Ancient Scraps
advancement.enderism.pirpell_hoe.title: Why would you even do that?!
advancement.enderism.pirpell_hoe.desc: Prove your agricultural commitment and upgrade your hoe, again
advancement.enderism.cursed_chorus.title: Bounce-back
advancement.enderism.cursed_chorus.desc: Eat a Cursed Chorus Fruit and teleport back somewhere
advancement.enderism.sculk_spine.title: Thanks, I'll be having that now
advancement.enderism.bad_charms.title: I can't believe you've done this.
advancement.enderism.bad_charms.desc: Use Wanderer's Charms containing every negative vanilla effect
advancement.enderism.multiclip.title: The Name's Bond
advancement.enderism.multiclip.desc: Fully load a crossbow with Multiclip, then fire all the projectiles
enchantment.enderism.aerodynamic.desc: Causes Elytra gliding to be faster
enchantment.enderism.upthrust.desc: Causes Elytra gliding to gain more height when going upwards
enchantment.enderism.velocity_protection: Decreases damage taken from kinetic energy
enchantment.enderism.pearling.desc: Allows Ender Pearls to be loaded into Crossbows
enchantment.enderism.cannoning.desc: Allows TNT to be loaded into Crossbows
enchantment.enderism.retributive.desc: Inflicts Retribution on the hit opponent, however inhibiting the crossbows ability to load Fireworks
enchantment.enderism.multiclip.desc: Loads multiple shots at once, however increasing loading times
enchantment.enderism.sniping.desc: Increases Speed and Power of arrows shot, dealing more damage based on how far the shot was taken from the hit point
effect.enderism.choruskirmish.descriptio: Gives users a small chance to spontaneously teleport when hit
effect.enderism.silencing.description: Causes user to emit no vibrations
effect.enderism.void_recall.description: Telports user back to safety after falling off of The End
effect.enderism.retribution.description: Damages users a fraction based on how much damage they deal during the effects duration
